inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponProficiency('Longsword'); effect.getBonuses().addWeaponProficiency('Greatsword'); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Proficiency, Large Swords
description: You are able to use longswords and two handed greatswords in combat.
